summary: A mourning son makes a deal to reanimate his one year dead mother, however things turn into an unexpected direction.
cast: Eric Christmas|Steve Buscemi|Harper Roisman|Sam Sorbo|Ned Beatty|Gary Farmer|Robert Harvey|John Glover|Miriam Margolyes|Jon Gries|Dawn Hudson|Eric Poppick|Rance Howard|Warren Munson|Carol Schlanger|John Walter Davis|Biff Yeager|Nancy Reed|Jessie Jones|Neal Jano|Laurie Franks
title: Ed y su difunta madre
